briefTitle: Telmisartan+Amlodipine Fixed Dose Combination in Hypertension
officialTitle: An Open-label Study to Evaluate the Antihypertensive Effects of the Fixed-dose Combination of Telmisartan 80 mg and Amlodipine 5 mg (T80/A5) Given Once Daily by 24 h ABPM in Patients With Moderate to Severe Hypertension
summary: The primary objectives of this trial is to evaluate the changes from baseline (Visit 2) in the 24-hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring mean (relative to dose time) for diastolic blood pressure and systolic blood pressure after 8 weeks of treatment with Telmisartan 80mg/Amlodipine 5mg in patients with moderate to severe hypertension

primaryOutcome.measure: DBP and SBP Change From Baseline in Mean 24-hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring (ABPM) Mean
